properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 12 at 2:12AM MST until February 12 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Billings MT
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow and blowing snow. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3
inches. North winds gusting as high as 40 mph.

* WHERE...Powder River, Carter, Custer and Fallon.

* WHEN...Until 11 PM MST this evening.

* IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult due to snow, gusty winds and
areas of blowing snow. Roadways impacted include I-94 near Miles
City, US-12 from Miles City to Baker, and Highway 7 from Baker
to Ekalaka.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The combination of falling temperatures and
gusty north winds will cause wind chills to fall well below zero
this afternoon and evening.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

For the latest road conditions, call 5 1 1.

Additional graphics for this hazard can be found at
http://www.weather.gov/billings

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING
